column1: #Text=Wikinews interviews Jim Babka , chair of Libertarian organization Downsize DC
#Text=A reporter from Wikinews recently interviewed Jim Babka , chair of Libertarian organization Downsize DC .
#Text=The organization claims to have arranged for 22,158 people to send a message regarding the " American Freedom Agenda Act " proposed by Ron Paul , in addition to supporting many other laws .

column1: #Text=The full text of the interview can be found below .
#Text=Jim Babka : DownsizeDC.org is an organization that makes it easy for every day citizens , with jobs and busy lives , to express their wishes to their two Senators and Representative .
#Text=It 's free and quite easy to use .
#Text=The DownsizeDC.org system combines education , recruitment , and activism into one simple , seamless process .
#Text=And once someone sends a message , they begin receiving our free email newsletter , or as we prefer to describe it , they become part of the Downsize DC Army .
#Text=Voltaire said , " God tends to be on the side of the bigger battalions .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=And we 're looking to build the Downsize DC Army so large that Congress cannot afford to ignore us – so big that we can get our message of small , Constitutionally-limited government out everywhere
